input.sentences: our trip to fun land was so cool today .
i got to see the seven dwarfs .
i got to ride roller coasters .
one roller coaster went so fast my mom could n't get a picture of me .
i had a lot of fun on the coasters today . i hope i can go back soon .
output.sentences: My vacation started with a trip to a park.
It also had many roller coasters.
My mom went on every single ride with me.
At the end of the day everyone had a lot of fun.
